title: Screen flashes on and off constantly
body: Never had this problem before; all of a sudden the screen + animations are turning on and off constantly. Ping is fine, no changes in lag, only this; incredibly annoying. Please help!

replies.body: Turned off Xbox DVR and STILL did not work...

Ayyyy that was good first step! That heckin' DVR fuction messes up a lot of players after Windows updates. Since that wasn't able to help, let's make sure that you've got v-sync turned on, and then check off the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a precaution.
